data.ART133: (English) Free ebook: The Rapture Survival Guide
data.ART_APP_HELP_CONTENT:
Hi, I'm a Christian programmer and made this application with my heart to serve the Lord. The end of time is close with tribulations, antichrist, Jesus and the final judgment.

Whattt! Are you serious? Yes, I'm serious, signs are everywhere. This application, giving the real Word of God, can help you be strong during this period when the devil will try to deceive you more than never and to be ready when Christ will come back. Remember yourselves that the devil knows the Scriptures. I added only good original Bibles (no re-edition) in several languages, I can understand, to help you find Jesus because he's the only way towards our Father. Don't remain in the darkness little children of God. Be good to your brothers and sisters, spread the light, love, pray, repent, have faith, joy, follow the commandments, stop your sins and sow abundantly. Let's follow Jesus, the good Shepherd, our only saviour… God bless you. Amen.


43 14 6 6 43 15 12 12 43 10 11 11 19 23 3 6 46 3 16 17 Search in the Bible Syntax: <book>
Syntax: <book> <chapter>
Syntax: <book> <chapter> <verse>
Syntax: <book> <expression>
Syntax: <book> <chapter> <expression>
Syntax: <expression>


Examples:
• Genesis
Gives chapter 1 of Genesis by default

• Genesis 1
Gives chapter 1 of Genesis

• Genesis 1 5
Gives the verse 1.5 of Genesis :)

• Genesis fire
Searches in Genesis all occurrences of 'fire'

• 1 6 lord
Searches in Genesis chapter 6 all occurrences of 'lord'

• abraham
Searches 'abraham' in all the Bible

• Revelation horse
Searches the horses of the Revelation :)

• 66 babylone
Searches 'babylone' in book 66 (Revelation)

• peter%church
Searches in the order, 'peter' and 'church' in all the Bible


Remarks:
- The book names are case sensitive, so select them in the list.
- Put accents in your words if they have:
Example: jézabel (French), jezebel (English)
Example: Élie (French), Elijah (English), Elia (Italian), Elías (Spanish)


Tips - Let the application resident, the memory is well managed
- Search result is useful to search verses in a language and get the exact same verses in another language, to learn, compare texts, check words…


Agreement This application will remain totally free, without advertising, redirections, offline and will not be sold. It is not a demo but a complete version.


Contact For any issues or suggestions, please contact me (About menu).
data.ART_APP_LOG_CONTENT:
3.5 • English Bible: Bible in Basic English 1949
Remark: Simplified English with less 1000 different English words. Always compare with KJV or other languages!
• English Bible: World English Bible 2000
Remark: Simplified English with more different English words than BBE but easier to understand than KJV. Always compare with KJV or other languages!
• French Bible: Darby

3.4 • Chinese Bible: New Chinese Version Simplified (will replace Chinese Union Version Simplified as there were errors with following glyphs: 冇, 有)
• Privacy policy

3.3 • Better performance
• Verse references are displayed if needed

3.2.1 • Turkish Bible: New Turkish Bible 2001
• Bengali Bible: Bengali C.L. Bible 2016
• Swahili Bible: Swahili Union Version 1997
• German Bible: Elberfelder 1932
• Romanian Bible: Romanian Cornilescu 1928
• Polish Bible: Biblia Warszawska 1975
• Bug fix

3.1 • Hindi Bible: Hindi Indian Revised Version 2017
• Arabic Bible: Smith & Van Dyke 1865
• Chinese Bible: Chinese Union Version Simplified
• Japanese Bible: New Japanese Bible 1973
• Russian Bible: Russian Synodal Translation 1876
• New setting for some Bibles: Language of user interface
• Removed German translation (please use the new setting)
• New scrolling and keys

3.0 • Spanish Bible: Reina Valera Actualizada 1989
• Italian Bible: Nuova Diodati 1991

• Works on Windows (with Cygwin) and PYPI, Git
• Works on MacOS with PYPI, Git
• Works on Android (with Termux) and PYPI, Git
• SPACEBAR key has been assigned to close menu as ESC key is problematic on some systems
• Menu bar has been replaced with B,P,A... keys to use standard keyboard but you can still use Fn keys
• Better output logs when quitting
• Keep favorites, history when upgrading the app in most cases

2.6 • About: Website
• Article: How to be saved?
• Article: Additional tools

2.5 • (English) Free ebook: The Rapture Survival Guide

2.4 • Search style

2.3 • Clipboard (C)

2.2 • Favorites
• Search for specific favorites (F6 or F)
• Open/Copy an URL (ENTER)

2.1 • History
• Cross references
• Contextual menu
• +Color modes

2.0 • English Bible: KJV 2000 (modern English)
• French Bible: Ostervald
• Portuguese Bible: Almeida Corrigida Fiel
• German Bible: Schlachter
• 2 color modes (with/without colors)
• +Articles
• +Youtubers
• LEFT/RIGHT to browse articles/parables
• Fixes

1.4 * Rebirth of the project:

• Snap
• Flatpak
• PYPI

1.3 • 13 articles
• 7 Youtubers

1.2 • Menu "M": Colors
• Bug fix

1.1 • Menu "M": Bibles to display

1.0 • Production (Linux, Mac, Raspberry)
data.ART_APP_HELP_KEYS_CONTENT:
ESC or SPACEBAR : Cancel
ENTER : Select
F2, B : Books
F3, S : Search in Bible
F6, F : Search in favorites
F4, A : Articles
F5, P : Parables
F10, Q : Quit
C : Clipboard
H : Help
M, F1, F7 : Menu
R : Reload

LEFT : Previous (chapter, article, parable)
RIGHT : Next (chapter, article, parable)
SHIFT LEFT : Previous page
SHIFT RIGHT : Next page

TAB : History
X, BACKSPACE : Delete entry of History (when in History)

UP, T : Select previous verse in page (for Context menu)
DOWN, V : Select next verse in page (for Context menu)
ENTER : Context menu

data.ART56_CONTENT:
The following list is incomplete and has no sequential order.
Some prophecies are already actual.
The other prophecies can come very quickly.



Please, pray to God and repent of your sins in the name of Jesus Christ, it is time to be born again Christian, to follow the commandments, to love, to forgive, to be a saint and to be included in the book of life. Give your life to Jesus Christ, time is short.



• Signs with the sun, the moon, the stars and the sky

• Injustice, iniquity (sins, extreme injustice)

• Apostasy (without religious faith)

• Earthquakes

• Other catastrophic events

• Famines

• Pestilences

• False doctrines

• Mockers

• The evil becomes good and the good becomes bad. Darkness becomes light and light becomes darkness

• The rise of evil

• Nation against nation, kingdom against kingdom

• Persecution of Christians and Jews

• Red heifer

• Dreams and visions

• Jews will say the Messiah is coming

• A kingdom will rise on kingdoms

• The Jewish people will make a new covenant and break the covenant with God

• Construction of the third temple

• Peace and safety, sudden destruction

• Seal of God

• Rapture of the bride (church) of Jesus Christ (the rapture should take place just before the coming of the devil on the earth)

• The coming of the Antichrist

• Battle of Armageddon

• Destruction of the new Babylon

• Destruction of Israel

• Destruction of the world

• False christs and false prophets

• New world religion (religion of Antichrist) and probably a new world government

• The Antichrist will proclaim to be God in a holy place, with the help of the false prophet

• Battle of Gog and Magog

• The two witnesses (prophets) of God from the end of times

• The two prophets of God have the power to close the sky, stop the rains and create all the wounds on the earth

• Death of the two prophets of God by the beast

! Worship of the beast and the image of the beast (heart, spirit, acts…)

! Mark of the beast (do not take it)

• Everyone will see Jesus Christ come on clouds (each knee will bow)

• Judgment of God
data.ART64_CONTENT:
In a video, a pastor said \"Nous sommes esclaves de Dieu\", in French.

Translation: \"We are slaves of God\" !

Really?! Let\'s check in the bible.

I only found 1 verse with \"esclaves de Dieu\", in French.

l 45 6 22 22

Let\'s check the verse in other languages:

k 45 6 22 22 d 45 6 22 22 v 45 6 22 22 a 45 6 22 22

In fact the French translation was bad and the exact word should be \"serviteurs\" (servants, servi, siervos, servos).



Another mistake:

l 48 4 7 7

Let\'s check the verse in other languages:

k 48 4 7 7 d 48 4 7 7 v 48 4 7 7 a 48 4 7 7

But this one is correct:

l 66 1 1 1 k 66 1 1 1 d 66 1 1 1 v 66 1 1 1 a 66 1 1 1

40 23 11 11

So the pastor didn\'t check the translation and I informed him.

You should know if you are ready!
Do you have oil in your lamp?
Therefore you will be encouraged.

52 5 19 19

data.ART133_CONTENT:
Be vigilant, always check in the Bible.

! I'm not the creator of this ebook.

Feel free to download this Rapture guide for people who will be left behind.

Think to copy it, share it, print it, send it, as soon as possible.

If you missed the rapture and want to know what happens, this ebook is very useful and will provide a lot of info.

You can jump to specific sections.

Of course, read the Bible and let the holy spirit works in you and guides you.

To make short Accept Jesus Christ as Lord and Saviour, only him can save you/us from eternity in Hell (lake of fire). Believe that you/we are all sinners and need a saviour. Believe that Jesus, the son of God came on Earth and gave his life, his precious blood for people believing in him. So if you believe in him, repent (yes, repent with your heart, it's absolutely necessary, don't repent to men or saints or angels or Mary but God the father in the name of Jesus). Believe that Jesus died on the cross (yes, he came to die for us, like the perfect lamb of God) and really died. He was resurrected 3 days later by his father (our father). Confess Jesus in your prayer to God and God will give you a new heart, you will be born again, a new creature. Stay away from sins as much as you can and walk each days in the Spirit. Make your best to seek the Lord, pray, meditate the word of God, talk to him (be careful that the devil will also talk to you, have discernment), be holy, be sanctified and continue to share the gospel, the word of God, the good news of salvation.

! Don't take the mark of the beast (mark on the right hand or the forehead). It's better to die for Jesus Christ than take the mark of the beast (Devil).

People who will take the mark of the beast will go to Hell and will be tormented days and nights.

Several URLs (where to get the ebook, some links might be broken)


Backup
======
(could not be the last version but there are less trackers)

• Backup version: https://gitlab.com/hotlittlewhitedog/BibleTheLife/-/tree/master/ebooks


From original web site
======================
(take the latest TRSG file)

• Last version: https://fluidicice.com/downloads


Original web site
=================

• Home: https://fluidicice.com

• Box: https://app.box.com/s/jplaw5euljmybbzqk02m0o3g4y2hcm84

• Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ljd2sitt9tztzm1z/AADNRiWtvTr1zZ1nBVQbkkI3a

• OneDrive (1): https://1drv.ms/u/s!AuxDPqkBHS-3zQMa-66lGrqgklFj?e=RPQdt5

• OneDrive (2): https://1drv.ms/u/s!AkxVecxqAulvgSiAaU9QvsVCtzKU?e=JVgbTo

data.ART134_CONTENT:
Definition 46 15 1 4 Important to know Good works are good but they can\'t save us. Don\'t think that you need to do this work and this work… to be saved. No, only the faith in Jesus saves, Jesus has done everything and no one else can cover our sins. Be vigilant, there are many false churches, false doctrines, false teachers, false prophets, false Christians. Don\'t stay with them!

49 2 8 9 As simple as an ABC A) ADMIT THAT YOU’RE A SINNER. This is where that godly sorrow leads to genuine repentance for sinning against the righteous God and there is a change of heart, we change our mind and God changes our hearts and regenates us from the inside out.

45 3 10 10 45 3 23 23 45 6 23 23 B) BELIEVE THAT JESUS CHRIST IS THE LORD AND BELIEVE IN YOUR HEART THAT JESUS CHRIST DIED FOR YOUR SINS, WAS BURIED, AND THAT GOD RAISED JESUS FROM THE DEAD. This is trusting with all of your heart that Jesus Christ is who he said he was and he died for us for our sins.

45 10 9 10 C) CALL UPON THE NAME OF THE LORD. This is trusting with all of your heart that Jesus Christ is who he said he was. Every single person who ever lived since Adam will bend their knee and confess with their mouth that Jesus Christ is Lord, the Lord of Lords and the King of Kings.

45 10 13 13

Apps: https://www.gotquestions.org/apps.html
